content: That sounds like a great game! I'll definitely consider it for our next family gathering. Speaking of family gatherings, we had a big one last weekend and played Scattergories with my cousins, which was a lot of fun. We're actually planning to host another game night soon to break out some of the games that have been collecting dust on my shelf. Do you have any recommendations for games that are good for a group of 6-8 players?
